text: Overpelt is a former municipality in the Belgian province of Limburg. On 1 January 2019, Neerpelt and Overpelt were merged into the new municipality of Pelt. In 2007, 13581 people lived there. It is at 51° 12 North, 05° 25 East. ==References== Category:Former municipalities of Limburg (Belgium)
title: Overpelt
